remarks: Lemma 1 for ~ mgm2nsgrp : ` M ` is a magma, even if ` A = B ` ( ` M ` is the trivial magma in this case, see ~ mgmb1mgm1 ).  (Contributed by AV, 27-Jan-2020.)
statement:
mgm2nsgrp.s $e |- S = { A , B } $.
mgm2nsgrp.b $e |- ( Base ` M ) = S $.
mgm2nsgrp.o $e |- ( +g ` M ) = ( x e. S , y e. S |-> if ( ( x = A /\ y = A ) , B , A ) ) $.
mgm2nsgrplem1 $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W ) -> M e. Mgm ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d M x $.
$d S x y $.
